title: Psyche and Eros
description: A stunning, exciting and hotly-anticipated feminist retelling of one of the greatest love stories in Greek mythology!When the god of love, Eros, is pricked by his own cursed arrow and falls for a spirited, fierce young mortal woman, Psyche, he knows that he is doomed to love a woman who will be torn from him if she ever looks upon his face...Luna McNamara's exquisitely written debut will appeal to fans of Madeline Miller, Jennifer Saint and Susan Stokes-Chapman.
author: Luna McNamara
